meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ovoviviparous.
meanings.sent1: The ovoviviparousnesses of certain animals allows them to give birth to live young.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ovoviviparousnesses of different species to understand their reproductive strategies.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that the ovoviviparousnesses of the snakes made them expert parents.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, the ovoviviparousnesses of creatures is a fascinating phenomenon.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the ovoviviparousnesses of the seahorses during the aquarium visit.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of producing eggs that hatch within the body of the parent.
meanings.sent1: The ovoviviparousnesses of the fish ensure the safety of their offspring.
meanings.sent2: The biologist explained the ovoviviparousnesses of reptiles to the students.
meanings.sent3: The farmer marveled at the ovoviviparousnesses of the chickens in his coop.
meanings.sent4: The concept of ovoviviparousnesses in nature is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The documentary highlighted the ovoviviparousnesses of various animals for educational purposes.
